availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Foster, Kentucky, boatman. Pennsylvania native. Married Julia Ann McMath. Father of Mary J. McMath, William W. McMath, Daniel McMath, Julian McMath, Robert McMath, Edward McMath, and Ella McMath. Boatman in Washington, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Neville, Ohio, in 1860. Resident of Foster, Kentucky, in 1863 and 1865.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Washington Township, p. 31; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Town of Neville Washington Township, p. 98; Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866, NARA RG 58, Records of the Internal Revenue Service, NARA Series M768, Roll 17, Bracken County, Kentucky, 1865, p. 129 (accessed via Ancestry.com); Find A Grave, "Daniel McMath (1814 - 1884)," Memorial #68390602, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=68390602 (accessed October 6, 2017).
